name: Yahoo! Mail : no ads, clean, minimal, modern
description:
A script that optimizes the interface of Yahoo! Mail.
-No ads
-Clean UI without gradient
-Highlight message color
-Remove scrolling bar in message view
-Blue theme (view instructions below to change color)
-Works across address Book, calendar and notepad
-Note : Works best with a non photo-based initial Y!Mail themes

To change the accent color :

- Open the script with the Stylish extension
- Look for the /*Blue Theme code section around line 30
- Replace the hexacode #1FA4C2, with your own
- You may use Colorpicker.com to find the hexacode corresponding to your favorite color
additional_info: --------------------------------------------------------------------------- NOTE => Screenshots are not representative of all the changes added below : --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 2.0 - optimizing top bar, search form and the newsfeed 1.6 - Removing the Olympic Games medal count table 1.5 - Removing ads 1.35 - Added color background to the calendar month browser, changed the default color to a more punchy one 1.3 - color adjustement for the news section 1.27 - color adjustment, instruction details Known minor issue : When one or more messages are selected, the "Spam" and "More" buttons should be clicked toward the bottom because of a layer I'm trying to get rid of.
